captions.text:
- Whoa!
- Hey! Hey! Hey!

- Taking your ass in, Jimmy.
- Uh-uh.

- Taking your ass in.
- Where are the handcuffs?

I got a license for
that, motherfucker.

You got a license for this?
Excuse me, all right?
Shit. All right! Yeah!

Now, you know what? I gotta
arrest you for that shit.

That shit's too good
to be on the street.

Wait a minute, I got this for you.
You ain't got to arrest nobody.
Are you bribing me now?

I'll tell you what,
I'm arresting everybody!

Now, all you're
under arrest! You first!

That's my family.
That's my...
Excuse me, excuse me.
Back it up, baby.
What was that?

- Come on, guys.
- What's the matter with you, man?

- I said, what the hell was that?
- What was what?

- I said what the hell are you doing, man?
- Be cool, man!
What's your fucking problem?

What the hell's
wrong with you?
Goddamn!

He's all right. I just
shot him in the leg, is all.
Damn, Jimmy!
Get up.

All right, everybody,
get out! Get out!

Come on, Frank,
it was an accident.

- It wasn't no goddamn accident.
- He feels terrible.

He don't feel shit, 'cause he's
coked up all the motherfucking time!

He's your driver.
Get rid of him.

Come on, man,
that's your cousin!
That ain't shit to me!
He don't mean nothing to me.

What's he gonna do,
go back home?

I don't give a damn
what he does!

Send his ass home!
Hey! Hey! Hey!

Hey! Don't rub on that!
You blot that!

You understand?
That's alpaca!

That's $25,000 alpaca!
You blot that shit!

You don't rub it!
Put the club soda on there.

Simple Simon-ass
motherfuckers.

Listen, from now on, don't nobody
talk to me directly! You understand?

You got business with me, you talk to
Huey! Huey, you talk to me! You got it?
All right.

Damn it, never on the phone!
You got it?

- I got it.
- All right!

And take them goddamn
sunglasses off.

Take the goddamn
sunglasses off!
Damn it, man.

Simple Simon-ass
motherfuckers.

One of Frank's biggest mistakes was that he did not kill his cousin 
"jimmy." Aside from the fact he had over 250 million in the 70's which is 
like 3 or 4 billion in today's market. Greed. Needed more, wanted more 
rather. The chinese dude gave him the BEST advice at the end. Whether that 
really  happened who knows. All I know is Frank only went to jail for a 
short time and was released and got into trouble AGAIN and then went back 
longer, getting out in 1991. The movie is REALLY far from the actual story 
and facts. But, Hollywood just wants a money making film and it WAS/IS a 
bad ass film. One of my top 25 favs. ﻿

comments.text:
+martinaee to the best of my knowledge, "Simple Simon" is a slang term for 
a simpleton, a.k.a. what we call these days an idiot or a moron...the "-ass 
motherfuckers" was just an extra embellishment...so calling them "simple 
simon ass motherfuckers" is just a way of calling them idiots.
